## GoogleAIFileManager.uploadFileFromUrl() method

Upload a file from a public URL. This method works in both Node.js and serverless environments.

**Signature:**

```typescript
uploadFileFromUrl(fileUrl: string, fileMetadata: FileMetadata): Promise<UploadFileResponse>;
```
